venue.address_2: Exit 5A off Rt 128/93 in strip mall on left across from Comfort Inn
venue.name: Dunkin Donuts Randolph

item.description:
This will be a beautiful backroads ride to Cindy's Diner in Scituate, RI.

Road Captain: Sue C

Meeting Location: Dunkin Donuts
1375 N Main St
(across from the Comfort Inn)
Randolph

From Rhode Island and Points South:

Take I-95 North to I-93. Take Exit 5A, and the hotel on your right, DD on left in strip mall.
From Boston and Points North: Take I-93 South to Exit 5A. The hotel is on your right, DD on left in strip mall.

From Cape Cod and Points East:

Take Route 3 North to I-93 South. Take exit 5A and the hotel is on your right, DD on left in strip mall.

Meeting time: 9 am
Riders meeting 930 am with ride
leaving right after meeting

gas: across street-arrive with full tank

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Saddle Tramps
